sentences.en: A participle has the function of an adjective.
Do the adverbial modifier , have seven meanings generally in participle.
sentences.cn: 分词做状语, 概有七意义.

sentences.en: Give the past and past participle forms of the verbs.
sentences.cn: 写出动词的过去式和过去分词形式.

sentences.en: In English grammar, the gerund has exactly the same form as the present participle.
sentences.cn: 英语语法中, 动名词具有与现在分词完全一样的形式.

sentences.en: Most of the past participle heading for the passive voice.
sentences.cn: 标题中的过去分词大多为被动语态.

sentences.en: Participle is used mostly as adjective or adverbial.
sentences.cn: 现在分词大部分用作形容词或副词.

sentences.en: Participle Squadrons: Every Squadron is automatically one of competition Squadrons.
sentences.cn: 参选中队: 每一中队为一单位,均自动成为参选中队.

sentences.en: So there will be a participle necessary.
sentences.cn: 于是就有了分词的必要.

sentences.en: Some, like swonken (the past participle of swink, meaning “to toil”, but also used to mean coupling), have disappeared.
sentences.cn: 如swonken（swink之过去分词，意指”辛苦劳作，艰难进行“，但亦有”交媾“之意。） ，但swonken一词早已消失。

sentences.en: Strewbis most commonly used in the past participle formBstrewn.
sentences.cn: 多见于其过去分词形式.

sentences.en: Teacher: "John, what is the past participle of the verb to ring?"
sentences.cn: 老师：“John，动词ring的过去分词是什么？”

sentences.en: The past participle as the Attribute Predicative and the object complement.
sentences.cn: 过去分词充当定语、表语和宾语补足语.

sentences.en: There are two participles, the present participle and the past participle.
sentences.cn: 分词有两种, 现在分词和过去分词.

sentences.en: There are two types of participle in English: the past participle and the present participle.
sentences.cn: 英语中有两类分词: 过去分词和现在分词.

sentences.en: We can often substitute a participle phrase for an attributive clause.
sentences.cn: 我们往往可用分词短语代替定语从句.

sentences.en: Who knows Past Tense and the Past Participle form of this verb?
sentences.cn: 谁晓得一般已往时和这个静词的功往总词?

sentences.en: You've got mixed up by the use of participle and gerund.
sentences.cn: 你混淆了现在分词和动名词的用法.

trans.tran_en: one of the forms of a verb that are used to make tenses. In English,  present participle s  end in -ing and  past participle s  usually end in -ed or -en.
